default.$description: Main surface background, one layer above page. Serves as the primary container surface color. USED IN: Sidepanels, configuration panel, Node Monitor

muted.$description: Muted background, one layer above surface-default. Used for secondary sections or nested containers on main surface. USED IN: Table Column Header, Value Switch bg, Card Array

subtle.$description: Topmost background, one layer above surface-muted.

default.$description: The base background for the entire app, on which all other surfaces sit on. The darkest background color in the dark theme. USED IN: Workflow Canvas

initial.$description: Transparent background for clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: for the initial states of elements with a transparent background e.g Link (initial), Button (transparent), .ValueSwitch-item (initial), TabBar (initial)

hover.$description: Subtle neutral overlay on hover for clickable elements. USED IN: Button Transparent, List Item

active.$description: Stronger neutral overlay for active (pressed) state feedback. USED IN: Button Transparent, List Item

initial.$description: More prominent background for clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: Badge

hover.$description: Lighter background on hover for more prominent clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: Badge

active.$description: Lightest background on pressed for more prominent clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: Badge

initial.$description: Teal background for primary actions or highlights.

hover.$description: Lighter teal background on hover for primary actions. USED IN: Button (outline and transparent variants), ProgressButton (Outline variant), SplitButton (outline), .TabBar-Item, Toggle, chip

active.$description: Lightest teal background on pressed for primary actions. USED IN: Button (outline and transparent variants), ProgressButton (Outline variant), SplitButton (outline), .TabBar-Item, Toggle, chip

initial.$description: Deep Teal background for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

hover.$description: Lighter teal background on hover for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

active.$description: Lightest teal background on pressed for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

initial.$description: Semi-transparent teal for selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item

hover.$description: Semi-transparent lighter teal on hover for selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item, List Item

active.$description: Semi-transparent lightest teal on pressed for selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item, List Item

initial.$description: Solid Teal background for most prominent, selectable elements. USED IN: RadioButton

hover.$description: Lighter teal background on hover for most prominent, selectable elements. USED IN: RadioButton

active.$description: Lightest teal background on pressed for most prominent, selectable elements. USED IN: RadioButton

initial.$description: Deep red background for error or destructive states. USED IN: Inline Message

hover.$description: Semi-transparent lighter red background on hover for error or destructive states. USED IN: Inline Message

active.$description: Semi-transparent lightest red background on pressed for error or destructive states. USED IN: Inline Message

initial.$description: More prominent red background for most prominent, error or destructive states. USED IN: Destructive Button

hover.$description: Semi-transparent lighter red background on hover for most prominent, error callouts or destructive buttons. USED IN: Destructive Button

active.$description: Semi-transparent lightest red background on pressed for most prominent, error callouts or destructive buttons. USED IN: Destructive Button

initial.$description: Neutral background for input elements. USED IN: Checkbox, RadioButton, Input components

hover.$description: Lighter neutral background on hover for input elements. USED IN: Checkbox, RadioButton, Input components

active.$description: Lightest neutral background on pressed for input elements. USED IN: Checkbox, RadioButton, Input components

default.$description: Neutral overlay for component backgrounds in the disabled state. USED IN: Buttons, checkboxes, input fields, and other components when disabled.

primary.$description: Disabled background for primary backgrounds. USED IN: Filled Button and other very prominent primary components when disabled.

danger.$description: Disabled background for bold danger backgrounds. USED IN: Filled Button and other very prominent bold danger components when disabled.

initial.$description: More prominent green background for most prominent, success states. USED IN: Success Button

info.$description: More prominent blue background for most prominent, informational messages.

info-muted.$description: Darker blue background on opaque for most prominent, informational messages.

warning.$description: Light orange background for warning states. USED IN: Inline Message

warning-muted.$description: Darker orange background on opaque for most prominent, warning states.

danger.$description: Very light red background for error or destructive states (red 100, lightened 60%).

danger-muted.$description: Darker red background on hover for error or destructive states. USED IN: Inline Message

success.$description: Light green background for success states. USED IN: Inline Message

success-muted.$description: Darker green background on opaque for most prominent, success states.

brand.$description: Vibrant brand yellow background for branding elements. USED IN: DesktopHeader-Tab

overlay.$description: Background color for content overlay like tooltip

neutral.$description: Text and icon color for primary content on dark surfaces.

muted.$description: Muted text and icon color for secondary content on dark surfaces.

subtle.$description: Subtle text and icon color for e.g. helper text inside input fields.

neutral-inverted.$description: Text and icon color for primary content on light surfaces.

primary.$description: Teal accent color for text and icons on dark surfaces.

primary-inverted.$description: Light teal color for text and icons on dark surfaces.

selected.$description: Teal color for selected text and icons on dark surfaces.

selected-inverted.$description: Very light teal color for selected text and icons on dark surfaces.

warning.$description: Orange color for warning text and icons on dark surfaces (e.g warning backgrounds).

warning-inverted.$description: Pale orange color for warning text and icons on dark surfaces (e.g warning backgrounds).

danger.$description: Red color for danger text and icons on dark surfaces (e.g danger backgrounds).

danger-inverted.$description: Pale red color for danger text and icons on dark surfaces (e.g danger backgrounds).

success.$description: Green color for success text and icons on dark surfaces (e.g success backgrounds).

success-inverted.$description: Pale green color for success text and icons on dark surfaces (e.g success backgrounds).

disabled.$description: Dimmed neutral color for text and icons in the disabled state.

disabled-inverted.$description: Color for text and icons in the disabled state on primary-disabled backgrounds.

info.$description: Blue color for informational text and icons on dark surfaces.

editor.$description: Text and icon color for editor content.

neutral.$description: Neutral border for components. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

muted.$description: Muted neutral border for less emphasis. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

subtle.$description: Subtle neutral border for faint components. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

primary-bold.$description: Dark teal border accent for most prominent emphasis. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

primary.$description: Light teal border accent for emphasis. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

selected-bold.$description: Teal border indicating the selected state (most prominent). Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

selected.$description: Faint teal border indicating the selected state. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

selected-accent.$description: Accent border indicating the accented selected state. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

warning-bold.$description: Orange border for most prominent warnings. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

warning.$description: Orange border for warnings. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

danger-bold.$description: Red border for most prominent error elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

danger.$description: Red border for error elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

success-bold.$description: Green border for most prominent success elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

success.$description: Green border for success elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

info-bold.$description: Blue border for most prominent info elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

info.$description: Blue border for info elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

disabled.$description: Neutral border for components in the disabled state. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

transparent.$description: Fully transparent border for components with invisible borders. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

brand.$description: Yellow border accent for brand highlights. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

neutral-bold-initial.$description: Neutral border for ResizeHandler. Used as reference token only for the ResizeHandler composite tokens.

neutral-bold-hover.$description: Neutral border for ResizeHandler. Used as reference token only for the ResizeHandler composite tokens.

neutral-bold-active.$description: Neutral border for ResizeHandler. Used as reference token only for the ResizeHandler composite tokens.

outline.$description: Blue outline highlight for focused elements. Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens.

background.$description: Blue background highlight for focused elements. Used with elements that are using 1px Border focus color through Border composite tokens.

default.$description: Dimmed overlay background for modals and dialogs.

flow-variable.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

loop.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

manipulator.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

predictor.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

source.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

visualizer.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

scope.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

learner.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

sink.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

container.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

unknown.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

other.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

specialNodesBold.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

specialNodes.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

specialNodes-muted.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

specialNodesBorder.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

specialNodesBackground.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

warningBold.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

warning.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

errorBold.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

error.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

loading.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

loadingBold.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

configuration.$description: Specific color for Nodes and Variables.

default.$description: Shimmering gray placeholder gradient for loading content animation.

top.$description: Light shadow layer color for the top elevation.

middle.$description: Medium shadow layer color for mid-level elevation.

bottom.$description: Dark shadow layer color for bottom elevation.

knob.$description: Dark shadow layer color for knob elevation. USED IN: ToggleSwitch
